snippet: RATNER--Michael. The trustees and staff of BAM mourn the passing of Michael Ratner, beloved brother of Bruce C. Ratner, BAM Board Chairman Emeritus. We extend our sincerest condolences to Bruce and his family. Chairman Alan H. Fishman, President Emerita Karen Brooks Hopkins. 1/3
lead_paragraph: RATNER--Michael. The trustees and staff of BAM mourn the passing of Michael Ratner, beloved brother of Bruce C. Ratner, BAM Board Chairman Emeritus. We extend our sincerest condolences to Bruce and his family. Chairman Alan H. Fishman, President Emerita Karen Brooks Hopkins. 1/3
